products.title: Zambezi Taped Pure White Real Wood
products.description: Their premium zambezi pure white real wood blind features a light white painted wood slat, great for freshening up your home. From soft stained brown shades, painted creamy neutrals to textured fine grains, this real wood range creates a natural chic finish to your windows. This white real wood blind would look at home in a rustic setting, or as a finishing touch to a neutral-toned room. Finish your blind with a touch of luxury with cotton white tape.

products.title: Polar Perfect Fit Sunwood
products.description: This stunning perfect fit sunwood blind comes in a range of quality fabrics - here we have it in polar. In addition, this blind includes controls to the left, no frame and no brackets (which are all options).

products.title: Pure Perfect Fit Sunwood
products.description: This handsome perfect fit sunwood blind comes in a range of fine fabrics - here we have it in pure. In addition, this blind includes controls to the left, no frame and no brackets (which are all options).

products.title: Pure Perfect Fit
products.description: A brilliant white shade, the pure white 25mm perfect fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any white upvc window or door. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected.

products.title: Polar Perfect Fit
products.description: An off-white shade, thepolar white25mm perfect fit blindis the perfect addition to any living space. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.

products.title: Artisan Off White
products.description: Artisan off white made to measure roman blind artisan off white made to measure roman blind.

products.title: Ritz Bright White Roller Blind
products.description: This blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Day & Night Woven Pure
products.description: The day & night woven pure roller blind features a light white colour that's both versatile and practical. The premium texture also helps to make this blind a stylish choice. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a charming addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Snow White Honeycomb Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: The gorgeous pleated snow white honeycomb dimout perfect fit blind is simple, stylish and versatile. Its elegant white can be paired in an endless amount of ways, to add a modern, classy feel to its paired window. You simply cant go wrong with a clean, crisp white blind struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Belmont Vanilla Roller Blind
products.description: The belmont vanilla roller blind is a brilliant way to spice up your window frame, with its change in blind texture and subtle stripes, this gentle cream coloured roller blind will really enhance your window without demanding the centre of attention. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Haze Pure Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The haze pure voile blind is a white sheer blind with a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Voile blinds, also known as sheer blinds, are a great way to give your home privacy whilst still letting the daylight in.

products.title: Pura White Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The pura white voile blind has a soft uniform weave to it, and is one of the purest white sheer blind we offer in their range. With a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Cotswold, Ghost White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Light and unassuming, the cotswold ghost white is a matt painted blind, comprising of thick, sturdy slats, a strong pelmet and headrail, and a matching bottom rail and acorns. And, treated well for protection, you can be sure that this blind won't warp or crack in use. For a fresh and inviting look in a country kitchen, couple the ghost white with a lush apple green. Use the green on the walls and match matt white tiles to the blind, then accessorise with the two tones to your heart's content.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Snow - Vertical Blind
products.description: From the safety conscious roma (fr) collection, the snow is a flame retardant blind, making it the perfect pick for a commercial property. Its practicality doesn't end there though, as the tilted vertical slats can be adjusted to suit your desired light, privacy, and ventilation. The snow will provide the ideal accent to a bold and bright colour scheme in a home office, where a sense of life and energy is all-important.

products.title: Infusion Asc White Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc white perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Blackout Roller, White (Blackout) - Loft Blind
products.description: Order from the skyline (blackout) collection before 10am and select fasttrack at checkout for next working day delivery. Featuring simple, plain colours and a pvc backing to help to block the light out when you need to get to sleep, the skyline (blackout) collection are some of their most popular skylight blinds. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).
